Class TestTestRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.testsuite.core.TestRunnerHelper
      • tests.testsuite.core.TestTestRunner

  • @PrepareForTest(value=TestRunner.class)
public class TestTestRunner
extends TestRunnerHelper
    Tests the class TestRunner. $java -Duser.language=de -Duser.country=DE

    0.2
